csheets.ui.sheet

Class WorkbookPane.SelectionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.JTabbedPane.ModelListener
      • csheets.ui.sheet.WorkbookPane.SelectionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventListener, ChangeListener
    Enclosing class:
    WorkbookPane

    protected class WorkbookPane.SelectionListener
extends JTabbedPane.ModelListener
    An extension of the change listener added to the tabbed pane's list selection model, which also updates the SelectionController
